comments:
Build ID: I20070517-1700

Steps To Reproduce:
I use RC1 UML downloaded from Europa update site.

Create Profile with empty name. Create stereotype which extends Class. Define profile. Action in UMLEditor is disabled, I used UML2Tools action. It means that it is possible to define such profile using API.

Create Package and Class in it. Apply that profile with empty name to Package and then apply stereotype to Class. it is possible to do with UMLEditor. Then NPE is thrown.
